mean_cn: v. 同意，赞成；  n. 同意，赞成
mean_en: to agree to or approve of something (such as an idea or suggestion) especially after carefully thinking about it
word_etyma: as一样+sent感觉→感觉一样→赞成
sentence: I asked my doctor if I could use this medicine, and he gave me his enthusiastic assent.
sentence_trans: 我问医生我是否可以服用这些药，他给予了我热情的赞成。
